column2: "It's a bit unusual that the residential area is experiencing a large-scale fire."
"According to eyewitnesses, a green, shiny substance appeared during the battle, suddenly igniting all at once."
"...a green, shiny substance? What could it be? Not right now! We've got to provide relief from the fire!"
"I'm begging you, take this \"Rescue Gun\" to put out the fires and help the people who couldn't get away!"
